issue.title: [C++] Investigate performance regressions observed in Unique, VisitArraySpanInline
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
See discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13364

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16837?focusedCommentId=17554968) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Note that some benchmarks offer unstable numbers so it might just be a false positive.
